message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.DS, cs.SY 

The paper proposes a framework for inverse optimization through online learning, which involves developing an online learning algorithm that can handle noisy data and prove convergence and statistical consistency under certain assumptions. This work is highly relevant to the fields of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI), as well as robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY) where optimization is a key component. Additionally, the use of regularity assumptions and statistical consistency suggests a connection to data science (cs.DS).
